timeline.author: Nightfirecat

timeline.bodyText: Instead of copying this from EmojiPlugin, move the method from there to Text (naming it removeFormattingTags) and make it public in a commit prior to the current changes. (and add tests for it--see TextTest's removeTags test cases)
timeline.author: Nightfirecat

timeline.bodyText: This would notify twice on broadcasts that have links. I recommend combining the bodies of these two conditional blocks by doing the following: make a guard clause for config.notifyOnBroadcast(), then a check for broadcast.lastIndexOf('|') being -1 (if it isn't, get the substring prior to that vertical bar). Finally, remove the formatting tags, then notify that string.
timeline.author: Nightfirecat
